phrases: A different world than this one.
Over there, the world has begun losing its magic.
Unlike this world, in Edolas, magic is limited.
If people use too much of it, it will eventually vanish from the world.
When resources began to dry up, Edolas's king made a decision to save their magic...
He invented a magic spell that would absorb magic from another world, namely this one.
It is the Hyperspace Magic, Anima.
It is what that hole in the sky was.
No, it will be dangerous to come with me.
and Anima were opened at various places around this world,
but it did not produce the results they expected.
Someone was going around and closing the Anima...
When I heard the story from Wendy about Jellal, I mean Mystogan,
I did not think it was possible, but...
I am sure of it now.
But the Anima this time was simply too large for anyone to defend against it,
Why did they suck up Fairy Tail?
This is all for Edolas's magical power.
There are a ton of powerful wizards at Fairy Tail!
Is that why it was targeted?
Man, how selfish can you get?
So this... is Carla's and my fault?
We were sent to this world from the Kingdom of Edolas with a separate mission.
You were born from an egg...
Just so you know, I have never set foot in Edolas.
Like Wendy said, I was born and raised in this world.
But knowledge of Edolas and our mission was ingrained in us.
We should have known it all from the moment we were born.
Why do not you know anything?
We are from Edolas, and what happened here is our fault.
You said something about a separate mission, Carla?
I want to know what I am!
I told you, I cannot say!
We have got everything settled, so let us go!
You do not understand at all...
All this unease is making me hungry.
That just proves you are alive!
In that case, we got to go save'them!
But I do not know if we could save them.
I do not even know if we could return from Edolas...
Well, as long as my friends are not here, I do not need to come back.
I guess I am basically a member of Fairy Tail too...
And I do feel somewhat responsible about what my home Kingdom has done...
I guess I might take you there...
But you need to promise me a few things.
Returning to Edolas is a violation of my orders.
We cannot be discovered by the people from the Kingdom.
Everyone has to be in disguise.
I have made up my mind.
Do not ask me about our orders.
And thirdly, I do not know anything other than basic info about Edolas.
If I or the he-cat do something to betray you, do not hesitate to kill us.
I would not do something like that...
And would you shut that thing up!
We are going to fly there?
Our wings are for returning to Edolas.
He-cat, open up your full magical power!
We can enter Edolas through the remaining traces of the Anima!
We will cut through with our wings, Aera!
It is full of strange trees and plants!
A river is flowing in the sky!
I know how you feel, but we did not come here to sightsee.
You cannot use magic freely here.
Let us go search for everyone!
Natsu, where exactly should we be searching?
I can rely on my nose for something like...
There is so many things I have never smelled before, I cannot tell what is what.
The air tastes a little different, too...
Does that mean fire'll taste different, too?
Do not ask me, thank you.
Is this any time to be relaxed, people?!
Anyway, where are we walking toward?
For now we will walk, and we will get somewhere eventually.
That is not going to solve anything.
We do not have any other way.
Anyway, there is no one here...
It is just one big forest.
Even so, we need to get in disguises.
I really do not think so...
This is not a disguise, it is camouflage!
What is important is that no one finds us, right?
I cannot say much for your fashion sense, but the idea has its merits.
It is that weird river from before!
I cannot believe that a river is flowing into the sky!
I bet that river is filled with yummy fish...
It looks like an Edolas human.
What did you imagine they would look like?
And he is fishing, of all things!
By the way, where is Natsu-san?
I am searching for this guild named Fairy Tail.
Have you seen them around somewhere?
I just asked a little question...
You are wearing a weird outfit, then ask about Fairy Tail?
How is he supposed to know what that means?
How else are we going to find out where everyone is?
If that man goes and reports to the Kingdom...
This camouflage is pointless, is not it?
Anyway, we have to hurry and find everyone.
Too bad that person did not leave his fishing rod behind...
Anyway, that is a strange sound...
You just do not learn, do you?
We will catch it and have a meal...
We have to get going before...
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
You cannot use magic freely in Edolas!
Not being able to use magic is going to be a real pain, is not it?
It is a little late to realize that now, Natsu!
Anyway, middle of the forest or not,
is not making such a big scene going to get us in trouble?
Tell that to the giant catfish!
This is what happens when we cannot use magic?!
I am hungry, but otherwise still alive.
Give it a rest already, okay?
We are not in disguise, so do not because any more commotion!
Not entirely, but for the most part!
I do not know what the Kingdom would do if they found out we are here.
In that case, I could not predict what would happen to us,
let alone whether we would be able to save everyone!
I do not really understand, but it is my fault, I guess...
What do not you understand about it?
Carla, you are going too far.
Natsu-san did not mean to do any harm.
If he meant it, that would make it even worse!
Stuff happens in life, you know, Natsu?
That is not cheering me up, Happy.
Plus, this is not a time for your stomach to be growling.
We are travelers who have lost our way!
Oh great Exceed, please spare our lives!
I wonder who they are talking about?
We cannot exactly fix things up now, right?
Uh, we have something we would like to ask you!
Our friends are here in Edolas, and...
When those people saw Carla and Happy, it seemed like they were frightened...
Was I making that scary a face?
Maybe they thought you would eat them!
Aw, I am not that hungry.
I have a bad feeling about this.
It looks like a storehouse of some kind...
I do not know how much good it will do now,
but let us borrow some clothes for disguises from here.
There is tons of fun clothes!
Natsu-san, do not look over here, okay?
You look good in anything, Carla.
The building's a little different, but it is Fairy Tail!
The guild seems really different, though.
Do not worry about the details, man!
Hey, that is the Request Board...
There is nothing weird at all, see?
So why are we sneaking around like this?
Juvia is going on a job now.
I wish you would take me with you... or something...
How many layers do you have on?
Strip down a little and call me again sometime.
Men in love sure get fired up.
You screwed up on a job, again?
Who do you think's going to pick up the slack?
The two vying for the strongest in Fairy Tail,
Jet and Droy, are lecturing Elfman again.
Hope they go easy on him...
Cana-san, why do not you have a drink with us for a change?
I know I have spoken of this before to you.
Do not cry at every little thing!
What the hell are you doing sneaking around under there?
What in the world is happening?
Everyone is personality has gone funky!
Maybe it is the effect of Edolas.
It is like everyone is personalities are reversed!
Gray wears too much clothing, Elfman's a crybaby, and Levy's a bad-girl!
If everyone is personality is backwards, what will Erza be like, I wonder?
The opposite of brutal, violent Erza would be...
